thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Confort and good food
thread.title_full: Confort and good food - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Josep-Alcover
title: Confort and good food
text: Very confortable hotel although some individual rooms are really tiny. Also some bathrooms, specially bathtubes need some updates. Used to have a small media center to plug your ipod or iphone but no more. Very good breakfast and restaurant. One of the bests places in the area
